passives.name: Mighty Quick Hit
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Quick Hit、 Quick Hit+

passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD when BRV is at least 50% MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: BRV Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.name: First Strike
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK of first action if first to act in each wave
passives.short_desc: First Strike: Raises ATK

passives.name: Mighty Slash
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Slash、 Slash+、 Slash Combo、 Slash Combo+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Slash: Increases BRV damage dealt with Slash、 Slash+、 Slash Combo、 Slash Combo+

passives.name: Ability Attack Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Attack Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Charged Quick Hit
passives.desc: Quick Hit use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Quick Hit: Raises use count of Quick Hit

passives.name: Break Bonus Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises Break Bonus upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Break Bonus Up: Raises Break Bonus

passives.name: Charged Slash
passives.desc: Slash use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Slash: Raises use count of Slash

passives.name: Ace Striker
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn when BRV drops to 0 or below
passives.short_desc: Ace Striker: Raises SPD

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Quick Hit Extension
passives.desc:
Quick Hit use +4

When using Quick Hit:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Self: 3 turns Winning Spirit

While Winning Spirit active:
 • Quick Hit becomes Quick Hit+ (instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume count during summoning、 support; does not grant Winning Spirit)
passives.short_desc: Quick Hit Extension: Boost to Quick Hit

passives.name: Debuffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK while an enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Slash Extension
passives.desc:
Slash use +1

When using Slash、 Slash Combo:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While Winning Spirit active:
 • Slash becomes Slash+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)、 Slash Combo becomes Slash Combo+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)

After using Slash、 Slash Combo、 Slash+、 Slash Combo+:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Slash Extension: Boost to Slash

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Buff Longer Slash Extension
passives.desc: When using Buff Longer Slash:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises own ATK for 3 turns
passives.short_desc: Buff Longer Slash Extension: Boost to Buff Longer Slash

passive.name: Buff Longer Slash Growth
passive.short_desc: Buff Longer Slash Growth: Boost to Buff Longer Slash

passive.name: Full HP Break Hit Speed Down
passive.desc: Inflicts SPD Down 20% for 6 turns when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break while HP at MAX
passive.short_desc: Full HP Break Hit Speed Down: Inflicts SPD Down when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

passive.name: Speed Burst
passive.desc: When using Quick Hit、 Quick Hit+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Self: 3 turns ATK Up I、 SPD Up I
passive.short_desc: Speed Burst: Boost to Quick Hit

passive.name: Vex
passive.desc:
Slash、 Slash+ become Slash Combo、 Slash Combo+ (BRV damage boost; melee BRV attack + HP attack)

When using Slash Combo、 Slash Combo+:
 • Turn rate+
 • SPD Down boost、 hit rate+、 duration+
 • Target: 6 turns ATK Down I、 DEF Down I

passive.name: Fayth's Dream
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Energy Rain
passive.short_desc: Fayth's Dream: May equip Energy Rain

passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Energy Rain
passives.short_desc: Mighty Energy Rain: Increases BRV damage dealt with Energy Rain

passives.name: Energy Rain Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Energy Rain
passives.short_desc: Energy Rain Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Energy Rain

passives.name: Fayth's Dream Buff Boost+
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Force Sabre (X) or passive ability Fayth's Dream with active buffs:\n• Moderately increased MAX BRV\n• HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; high turn rate)
passives.short_desc: Fayth's Dream Buff Boost+: Grants MAX BRV Up with active buffs

passive.name: Dark Dream's Power
passive.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Quick Hit、 Quick Hit+、 Slash、 Slash Combo
passive.short_desc: Dark Dream's Power: Increases BRV damage dealt with Quick Hit、 Quick Hit+、 Slash、 Slash Combo

passive.name: Fayth's Dream Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Energy Rain
passive.short_desc: Fayth's Dream Extension: Boost to Energy Rain

passives.name: Energy Rain Advance
passives.desc: When using Energy Rain:\nStolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Energy Rain Advance: Boost to Energy Rain

passives.name: Fayth's Dream Extension Attack Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Force Sabre (X)+ or passive ability Fayth's Dream Extension:
 • Slightly raises ATK

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Fayth's Dream Extension Attack Up++: Raises ATK; enables HP Attack++

passives.name: Energy Rain Force Buff Starting Plus
passives.desc:
When using Energy Rain:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Self: 3 turns Winning Spirit

3 turns Winning Spirit at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Energy Rain Force Buff Starting Plus: Boost to Energy Rain; Winning Spirit at start of quest

passives.name: Energy Rain Advance II
passives.desc: Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Energy Rain
passives.short_desc: Energy Rain Advance II: Boost to Energy Rain
